definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The hot water heat exchanger respectively connects to tap water pipe and heat insulating water tank.
sentences.chinese: 該熱水換熱器分別與自來水管和保溫水箱連接。

sentences.english: Strictly prohibited ground connected to the zero line or water pipe .
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁將地線接在零線或自來水管上。

sentences.english: The water inlet of the toilet is communicated with a tap water pipe through a valve.
sentences.chinese: 所述坐便器的進水口通過閥門與自來水管連通。

sentences.english: Why does she always want to drag up a subject that makes her act like a human hosepipe ?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼總要扯出一個讓她變成自來水管的話題呢？

sentences.english: Under the road run pipes for gas and water.
sentences.chinese: 在馬路下面鋪着煤氣管道和自來水管。

sentences.english: We need to replace the water pipes with new ones.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要更換新的自來水管。

sentences.english: Tap on a pipe or wall so rescuers can locate you.
sentences.chinese: 自來水管上或牆上，營救人員就可以找到您。

definition: lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
to form a picture/to develop a photo/to visualize
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
people are in a terrible situation (idiom)
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
